amendment.description: An amendment numbered 140 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding by $1,720,000 for Chronic Wasting Disease (CWD) research in wild and captive populations of cervids.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Gosar.
